titles: A true and impartial account of a great and bloody fight between part of the English fleet, commanded by Sir Clovesly Shovel and the French at sea with an account of the men killed and wounded : together with the great bravery and courage of Captain Hoskins, from on board Their Majesties ship the Crown, this ninth of December, 1690, riding Plimouth-Sound.
author: Tutchin, John, 1661?-1707.
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  William and Mary, 1689-1702.
